Research carried out in collaboration with Prof. Atilla Aydin (Stanford University), Prof. Beth Parker and John Cherry (Guelph University). Main focus:
- Shale smearing, fault architecture and permeability structure.

Responsibilities included project management, technical reports, training, technology transfer and development of the Mining, South America, CIS business portfolios.', 'title': 'Structural Geologist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 29903, 'name': 'University of Camerino', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFFt9mOOovErg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856494368?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=WJW4IjOQY7fFFhdMsQ9vsQXHBlDyacfj4G4Czs2lDfk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/universitacamerino/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'University of Camerino', 'description': 'During the Ph.D.,  which was supervised by Prof. Emanuele Tondi and Prof. Fabrizio Agosta, I focused on the definition of fault dimensional parameters, the microstructural and textural characterization of beformation band based faults in porous carbonates from four different areas of Italy.
The research I carried out integrated field work (i.e., geological survey, structural analysis and stratigraphy) with laboratory (i.e. microstructural analysis optical and electronic microscopes, 3D porosity measurements, rock deformation experiments) to characterize natural structures and to reproduce similar features in the laboratory. Rock deformation experiments, carried out in collaboration with the Institut de Physique du Globe (Strasbourg, France), HPT-Lab of Utrecht University (Utrecht, The Netherland) and Rock Def. Lab. of Liverpool (United Kingdom), allowed to better constrain the boundary conditions and the micro-mechanisms responsible of the formation of natural structures.', 'title': 'Ph.D.', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 151497, 'name': 'Bonatti S.p.A.', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEZ_SrmwTVpfQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1598452797683?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=3gLXMqADvjOIy6aywPEypT2QNXlzDFgCPNy4DAifk1I', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/bonatti/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'Bonatti', 'description': 'Field work, Geology applied to HSE, Stratigraphy and Fracture Analysis.', 'title': 'Assistant Geologist', 'employment_type': None}]}]
